desc: Artisan handmade and handcrafted cold process soaps and bath products. Preservative Free. Vegan. Indulge in the beauty, aroma and emollient lather of our handcrafted soaps. Our soaps are hand-churned in small batches using all natural oils, butters, and botanicals. These botanicals come from all over the world!

layout.text: And we like 'em vegan + preservative free
